body_content.explanation: a class taught by someone who has an expert knowledge or skill in a particular area, especially in music:
examples: The highlight will be a cookery masterclass based on recipes from his new cook book.
He was offered a place on a poetry masterclass given by a prize-winning poet.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which someone does something extremely well or badly, showing how it should or should not be done:
examples: He gave a masterclass in political showmanship at his first ever press conference in Paris.
This is a masterclass in how not to greet your guests.
